Contents:

Lushootseed Grammar (speakers appear to be Louise George and Dewey Mitchell; with Thom Hess and Vi Hilbert, La Conner, 12-28-72

  • Tr. 1 - s?úGusaliI dx?al ?adad ti?iA sGedGatad Gat (10:54)
  • Tr. 2 - s?úGusaliI dx?al ?adad ti?iA sGedGatad Val (11:55)
  • Tr. 3 – Lexical suffixes (10:30)
